comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: The rail platform is at Bongalong, roughly halfway between Cootamundra and Coolac, New South Wales. See a 1980 view of the rail platform, including the "BONGALONG" sign and the edge of this rail crossing here: www.nswrail.net/locations/photo.php?name=NSW:Bongalong:5
